languages.text: Иногда персонажи попадают в ситуации, которые требуют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} их {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыков{/g}. Для прохождения таких проверок ролевая система эмулирует бросок кубика d100. Чтобы успешно пройти проверку характеристики или навыка, нужно выбросить на кубике значение меньше, чем показатель соответствующей характеристики или навыка этого персонажа. При этом проверка обычно имеет сложность, которая выражается в модификаторе к значению характеристики или навыка.

Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.
languages.original_text: Иногда персонажи попадают в ситуации, которые требуют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} их {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыков{/g}. Для прохождения таких проверок ролевая система эмулирует бросок кубика d100. Чтобы успешно пройти проверку характеристики или навыка, нужно выбросить на кубике значение меньше, чем показатель соответствующей характеристики или навыка этого персонажа. При этом проверка обычно имеет сложность, которая выражается в модификаторе к значению характеристики или навыка.

traits.locale_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that test their characteristics and skills. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or skill test, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also have a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

Your characters will find themselves in situations that test their characteristics and skills. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or skill test, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also have a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

Your characters will find themselves in situations that test their characteristics and skills. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or skill test, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

languages.text: Deine Charaktere werden in Situationen geraten, die ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} stellen. Zum Zweck dieser Proben simuliert das Spiel einen Wurf mit einem 100-seitigen Würfel. Damit ein Charakter eine Eigenschafts- oder {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} besteht, muss er eine Zahl würfeln, die kleiner als sein entsprechender Eigenschafts- bzw. Fertigkeitswert ist. Jede Probe hat außerdem eine zugehörige Schwierigkeit, die als Modifikator des relevanten Eigenschafts- bzw. Fertigkeitswerts fungiert.
languages.original_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

traits.locale_text: Deine Charaktere werden in Situationen geraten, die ihre Eigenschaften und {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} stellen. Zum Zweck dieser Proben simuliert das Spiel einen Wurf mit einem 100-seitigen Würfel. Damit ein Charakter eine Eigenschafts- oder Fertigkeitsprobe besteht, muss er eine Zahl würfeln, die kleiner als sein entsprechender Eigenschafts- bzw. Fertigkeitswert ist. Jede Probe hat außerdem eine zugehörige Schwierigkeit, die als Modifikator des relevanten Eigenschafts- bzw. Fertigkeitswerts fungiert.

languages.text: Vos personnages se retrouveront dans des situations qui {g|Encyclopedia:Test}mettront à l'épreuve{/g} leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} et leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g}. Pour les besoins de ces tests, le jeu simule un jet de dés à 100 faces. Pour qu'un personnage réussisse un {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}test de caractéristique ou de compétence{/g}, il doit obtenir un résultat inférieur à son score de caractéristique ou de compétence correspondant. Chaque test est également associé à une difficulté, qui agit comme modificateur du score de la caractéristique ou de la compétence concernée.
languages.original_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

traits.locale_text: Vos personnages se retrouveront dans des situations qui {g|Encyclopedia:Test}mettront à l'épreuve{/g} leurs caractéristiques et leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g}. Pour les besoins de ces tests, le jeu simule un jet de dés à 100 faces. Pour qu'un personnage réussisse un test de caractéristique ou de compétence, il doit obtenir un résultat inférieur à son score de caractéristique ou de compétence correspondant. Chaque test est également associé à une difficulté, qui agit comme modificateur du score de la caractéristique ou de la compétence concernée.

languages.text: 您的角色时常需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。检定时，系统会投掷一百面骰。 若要通过属性或{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}技能检定{/g}，掷骰结果必须低于相应属性或技能的检定值。 不同的检定有着不同的难度系数，代表该项属性或技能检定的难度。
languages.original_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

traits.locale_text: 您的角色时常需要进行属性或{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。检定时，系统会投掷一百面骰。 若要通过属性或技能检定，掷骰结果必须低于相应属性或技能的检定值。 不同的检定有着不同的难度系数，代表该项属性或技能检定的难度。

languages.text: Tus personajes se toparán con ocasiones en las que deben poner a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g}. A efectos de dichas pruebas, se simulará una tirada con un dado de 100 caras. Para que un personaje supere una {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}prueba de habilidad{/g} o característica, tendrá que sacar un número menor que su índice de la característica o habilidad correspondiente. Cada prueba tiene una dificultad asociada que modifica el índice de la característica o habilidad pertinente.
languages.original_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

traits.locale_text: Tus personajes se toparán con ocasiones en las que deben poner a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} sus características y {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g}. A efectos de dichas pruebas, se simulará una tirada con un dado de 100 caras. Para que un personaje supere una prueba de habilidad o característica, tendrá que sacar un número menor que su índice de la característica o habilidad correspondiente. Cada prueba tiene una dificultad asociada que modifica el índice de la característica o habilidad pertinente.

languages.original_text: Characters sometimes find themselves in situations that require checks on their characteristics or skills. To pass such checks, the role-playing system emulates a d100 die roll. To successfully pass a characteristic or skill check, you must roll a value on the die that is less than the value of the character's corresponding characteristic or skill. The check usually has a difficulty that is expressed as a modifier to the value of the characteristic or skill.

languages.text: キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}される状況に陥る時がある。こうしたテスト用に、ゲームには100面サイコロが用意されている。 特性や{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}スキル判定{/g}に成功するためには、キャラクターは、その特性やスキルスコアよりも小さい数字を出さなくてはならない。 判定には難易度があり、該当する特性やスキルスコアの調整因子の役割を果たす。
languages.original_text: Your characters will find themselves in situations that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. For the purposes of such tests, the game simulates a 100-sided die roll. For a character to pass a characteristic or {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTestsGlossary}skill test{/g}, they must roll a number less than their corresponding characteristic or skill score. Every test also has a difficulty associated with it, which acts as a modifier to the relevant characteristic or skill score.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターは能力や{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テストされる{/g}状況に陥る時がある。こうしたテスト用に、ゲームには100面サイコロが用意されている。 キャラクターが能力やスキル判定を成功させるには、その能力やスキルスコアよりも小さい数字を出さなくてはならない。 判定には難易度があり、該当する能力やスキルスコアの調整因子の役割を果たす。
